channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Exclusive: Trump says Iran wants a deal as U.S. "armada" arrives
item.description: President Trump told Axios in an interview on Monday that the situation with Iran is "in flux" because he sent a "big armada" to the region but thinks...

item.title: Exclusive: Trump says Hamas helped find last hostage, now must disarm
item.description: President Trump told Axios in an interview on Monday that Hamas had helped locate the remains of the last Israeli hostage. He called on the group to n...

item.title: House Democrats' support for impeaching Kristi Noem surges after Minnesota shooting
item.description: House Democrats' support for impeaching Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem is accelerating quickly in the aftermath of the fatal shooting of Alex...

item.title: Inside Dems' 11th-hour push to force changes to ICE
item.description: Most Senate Democrats seem prepared to shut down the federal government over funding for DHS. But internally, they're facing a debate over how hard a ...

item.title: Trump signals de-escalation of ICE ops in Minneapolis
item.description: President Trump suggested in a Monday phone call with Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz that he's open to reducing the number of federal immigration agents in M...

item.title: Republican drops bid for governor, citing GOP’s ‘retribution’ on Minnesota

item.title: DOJ, FBI on sidelines in Minnesota shooting probe; state vows investigation
item.description: Since an immigration officer fatally shot a man in Minneapolis, the federal agents who would typically be involved in investigating have taken a back ...

item.title: Trump tries — again — to deliver a winning message on affordability
item.description: The push comes after weeks of freewheeling speeches and international controversy that reflected Trump’s tendency to derail his own message.

item.title: Border Patrol’s role during protests has come under increasing scrutiny
Fatal shooting in Minneapolis renews protests; video raises questions about DHS account
item.description: The victim in the shooting was identified as Alexander “Alex” Pretti, 37, of Minneapolis.

item.title: Americans give Trump low marks on handling of economy as midterms likely to center on affordability
item.description: Sixty-one percent of voters told a CNN poll released Friday that they disapprove of the way Trump is handling the economy.

item.title: Capitol agenda: Trump tests GOP with Fed probe
Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
